languages.text: "Похоже, когда ты подош{mf|ел|ла} слишком близко, то тоже стал{mf||а} частью ритуала. Поэтому я не почувствовала твое присутствие сразу. И потому же ты не мог{mf||ла} уйти". {n}Дрожащей рукой Ирлиэт гладит острые края осколков и со вскриком отдергивает руку, когда камень душ оставляет на ее пальце ранку.{/n}

"It seems that you became part of the rite when you drew too close. That is why I did not sense you straight away and why you could not leave." {n}With a trembling hand, Yrliet strokes the spirit stone shards, then jerks her hand away with a cry, staring at a cut on her finger.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Похоже, когда ты подош{mf|ел|ла} слишком близко, то тоже стал{mf||а} частью ритуала. Поэтому я не почувствовала твое присутствие сразу. И потому же ты не мог{mf||ла} уйти". {n}Дрожащей рукой Ирлиэт гладит острые края осколков и со вскриком отдергивает руку, когда камень душ оставляет на ее пальце ранку.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "It seems that you became a part of the rite as well after getting too close. That's why I didn't sense you straight away and why you couldn't leave." {n}With a trembling hand, Yrliet strokes the spirit stone shards, then jerks her hand away with a cry, having cut her finger on the spirit stone.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It seems that you became a part of the rite as well after getting too close. That's why I didn't sense you straight away and why you couldn't leave." {n}With a trembling hand, Yrliet strokes the spirit stone shards, then jerks her hand away with a cry, having cut her finger on the spirit stone.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It seems that you became part of the rite when you drew too close. That is why I did not sense you straight away and why you could not leave." {n}With a trembling hand, Yrliet strokes the spirit stone shards, then jerks her hand away with a cry, staring at a cut on her finger.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It seems that you became part of the rite when you drew too close. That is why I did not sense you straight away and why you could not leave." {n}With a trembling hand, Yrliet strokes the spirit stone shards, then jerks her hand away with a cry, staring at a cut on her finger.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It seems that you became part of the rite when you drew too close. That is why I did not sense you straight away and why you could not leave." {n}With a trembling hand, Yrliet strokes the spirit stone shards, then jerks her hand away with a cry, staring at a cut on her finger.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “看来是因为你离我太近，因此身不由己地成为了仪式的一部分。这也是为什么我没能立刻感知到你的存在，为什么你无法离开。”{n}伊莉耶特颤巍巍地抚上胸前四分五裂的灵魂石，碎片无情地划破了她的手指，她呜咽着收回了手。{/n}
languages.original_text: "It seems that you became part of the rite when you drew too close. That is why I did not sense you straight away and why you could not leave." {n}With a trembling hand, Yrliet strokes the spirit stone shards, then jerks her hand away with a cry, staring at a cut on her finger.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “看来是因为你离我太近，因此身不由己地成为了仪式的一部分。这也是为什么我没能立刻感知到你的存在，为什么你无法离开。”{n}伊莉耶特颤巍巍地抚上胸前四分五裂的灵魂石，碎片无情地划破了她的手指，她呜咽着收回了手。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Parece que te acercaste demasiado y te convertiste en parte del ritual. Por eso no percibí tu presencia enseguida, y por eso no podías marcharte». {n}Yrliet acaricia con dedos temblorosos los fragmentos de su joya espiritual; de repente aparta las manos dando un grito y ve que se ha cortado en un dedo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It seems that you became part of the rite when you drew too close. That is why I did not sense you straight away and why you could not leave." {n}With a trembling hand, Yrliet strokes the spirit stone shards, then jerks her hand away with a cry, staring at a cut on her finger.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Parece que te acercaste demasiado y te convertiste en parte del ritual. Por eso no percibí tu presencia enseguida, y por eso no podías marcharte». {n}Yrliet acaricia con dedos temblorosos los fragmentos de su joya espiritual; de repente aparta las manos dando un grito y ve que se ha cortado en un dedo.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Il semblerait que vous ayez été {mf|pris|prise} dans le rite lorsque vous vous êtes {mf|approché|approchée}. C'est pour cela que je n'ai pas perçu votre présence tout de suite et que vous n'avez pas pu partir. » {n}D'une main tremblante, Yrliet caresse les éclats de sa pierre-esprit et pousse un cri de douleur en s'y coupant le doigt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It seems that you became part of the rite when you drew too close. That is why I did not sense you straight away and why you could not leave." {n}With a trembling hand, Yrliet strokes the spirit stone shards, then jerks her hand away with a cry, staring at a cut on her finger.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Il semblerait que vous ayez été {mf|pris|prise} dans le rite lorsque vous vous êtes {mf|approché|approchée}. C'est pour cela que je n'ai pas perçu votre présence tout de suite et que vous n'avez pas pu partir. » {n}D'une main tremblante, Yrliet caresse les éclats de sa pierre-esprit et pousse un cri de douleur en s'y coupant le doigt.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Anscheinend wurdet Ihr zu einem Teil des Rituals, weil Ihr Euch zu weit genähert habt. Darum habe ich Euch nicht sofort gespürt, und darum konntet Ihr auch nicht gehen." {n}Mit zitternder Hand streicht Yrliet über die Splitter des Seelensteins, zieht sie dann mit einem Aufschrei zurück und starrt auf einen Schnitt in ihrem Finger.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It seems that you became part of the rite when you drew too close. That is why I did not sense you straight away and why you could not leave." {n}With a trembling hand, Yrliet strokes the spirit stone shards, then jerks her hand away with a cry, staring at a cut on her finger.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Anscheinend wurdet Ihr zu einem Teil des Rituals, weil Ihr Euch zu weit genähert habt. Darum habe ich Euch nicht sofort gespürt, und darum konntet Ihr auch nicht gehen." {n}Mit zitternder Hand streicht Yrliet über die Splitter des Seelensteins, zieht sie dann mit einem Aufschrei zurück und starrt auf einen Schnitt in ihrem Finger.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「お前が儀式の一部になったのは、どうやらお前が近づきすぎたからだ。それが、我がお前をすぐに感じられなかった理由であり、お前が離れられなかった理由でもある」{n}震える手でユリエットは魂縛石の欠片を撫で、それから叫びながら手を離し、指の切り傷を見つめた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "It seems that you became part of the rite when you drew too close. That is why I did not sense you straight away and why you could not leave." {n}With a trembling hand, Yrliet strokes the spirit stone shards, then jerks her hand away with a cry, staring at a cut on her finger.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「お前が儀式の一部になったのは、どうやらお前が近づきすぎたからだ。それが、我がお前をすぐに感じられなかった理由であり、お前が離れられなかった理由でもある」{n}震える手でユリエットは魂縛石の欠片を撫で、それから叫びながら手を離し、指の切り傷を見つめた。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Yaklaştığında sen de ayinin bir parçası oldun. Bu yüzden seni hemen hissedemedim, bu yüzden hemen oradan ayrılamadın." {n}Yrliet, titrek elleriyle ruh taşı parçalarını okşuyor. Sonra bağırarak elini çekiyor ve parmağındaki kesiğe bakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It seems that you became part of the rite when you drew too close. That is why I did not sense you straight away and why you could not leave." {n}With a trembling hand, Yrliet strokes the spirit stone shards, then jerks her hand away with a cry, staring at a cut on her finger.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Yaklaştığında sen de ayinin bir parçası oldun. Bu yüzden seni hemen hissedemedim, bu yüzden hemen oradan ayrılamadın." {n}Yrliet, titrek elleriyle ruh taşı parçalarını okşuyor. Sonra bağırarak elini çekiyor ve parmağındaki kesiğe bakıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
